DOC.brief_summary: The Learning Online Video Education ( LOVE ) study seek determine online instructional video administer medication need vitro fertilization ( IVF ) help improve quality life reduce stress IVF process .
DOC.brief_title: Learning From Online Video Education Controlled Ovarian Stimulation
DOC.detailed_description: The Learning Online Video Education ( LOVE ) randomize control trial seek determine effect instructional online video medication administration psychological well control ovarian stimulation . The investigator hypothesize usage online instructional video woman undergo first cycle control ovarian stimulation vitro fertilization oocyte cryopreservation improve measure psychological well-being ( Infertility Self Efficacy Scale , FertiQoL-T Perceived stress score ) compare subject access educational resource .
